biotools.summary:
A validated software for radiomics analysis of medical images in radiation oncology.
ROdiomiX is a MATLAB-based framework for the computation of radiomic features and feature aggregation techniques in compliance with the Image-Biomarker-Standardization-Initiative (IBSI) guidelines, which includes preprocessing protocols and quantitative benchmark results for analysis of computational phantom images.

bioschemas.name: ROdiomiX
bioschemas.summary:
